name: rc-facebook-login
description: A react component for Facebook Login. It's a customizable Facebook Login component.

scripts.min: npx google-closure-compiler --js=build/index.js --js_output_file=dist/index.js && npx google-closure-compiler --js=build/hooks/useFacebookLogin.js --js_output_file=dist/hooks/useFacebookLogin.js && npx google-closure-compiler --js=build/decodeParam.js --js_output_file=dist/decodeParam.js && npx google-closure-compiler --js=build/FacebookLogin.js --js_output_file=dist/FacebookLogin.js && npx google-closure-compiler --js=build/objectToParams.js --js_output_file=dist/objectToParams.js
scripts.cpd.ts: cp build/**.d.ts dist/ && cp build/types/**.d.ts dist/types/ && cp build/hooks/**.d.ts dist/hooks/
scripts.build: yarn d:dist && tsc -p . && yarn min && yarn cpd.ts && yarn d:build

author: https://github.com/saifulislamsojib
